name: CVSMPTETime
desc: A structure for holding an SMPTE time.

items.name: init(subframes: Int16, subframeDivisor: Int16, counter: UInt32, type: UInt32, flags: UInt32, hours: Int16, minutes: Int16, seconds: Int16, frames: Int16)
var counter: UInt32
items.desc: The total number of messages received.

items.name: var flags: UInt32
items.desc: A set of flags that indicate the SMPTE state. See SMPTE State Flags for possible values.

items.name: var frames: Int16
items.desc: The number of frames in the full message.

items.name: var hours: Int16
items.desc: The number of hours in the full message.

items.name: var minutes: Int16
items.desc: The number of minutes in the full message.

items.name: var seconds: Int16
items.desc: The number of seconds in the full message.

items.name: var subframeDivisor: Int16
items.desc: The number of subframes per frame (typically, 80).

items.name: var subframes: Int16
items.desc: The number of subframes in the full message.

items.name: var type: UInt32
items.desc: The kind of SMPTE time type. See SMPTE Time Types for a list of possible values.
